articles.author: Emma Roth
articles.title: Trump wants Apple to stop making more iPhones in India - The Verge
articles.description: President Donald Trump told Apple CEO Tim Cook that he doesn’t want the company to build iPhones in India, and claimed Apple is going to be “upping their production” in the US.
articles.content:
Were not interested in you building in India.
Were not interested in you building in India.
President Donald Trump told Apple CEO Tim Cook that he doesnt want the company to move iPhone production … [+814 chars]
